name: Work_Force
description: The workforce that is assigned to the appointment

name: Product_Category
description: Category of the product for which the appointment is scheduled

description: Type of technology for which the appointment is scheduled

name: Work_Order_Action
description: The type of the action scheduled for the appointment

description: Categorization for work order action is scheduled for the appointment

description: One of the 42 districts where the appointment is scheduled

name: Province
description: The province where the appointment is scheduled

name: Product_Key
description: Product key for which the appointment is scheduled

name: Product
description: Product for which the appointment is scheduled

description: Categorization for product for which the appointment is scheduled

name: SWT
description: Total number of SWT hours estimated for appointments grouped in this record

name: AWT
description: Total number of actual hours informed for appointments grouped in this record

name: JobCount
description: Total number of jobs grouped in the table record

name: WorkOrderCount
description: Total number of work orders grouped in the table record
